short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One link that shares your shopping cart with friends, family, and co-workers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛍️ Share your cart on stores such as: Amazon, Walmart, and millions more! 

*** Eliminates the need for wishlists, screenshots, or account sharing ***

✅ Amazon Supported 
 • Works on all international Amazon stores.
 • Quicker & more efficient than Amazon wishlists.

🔑 Key Features
• One link that shares your entire cart.
• Modify the items you want to share.
• View your shared cart history.
• No expiration date on cart links.

💡 How it works 
 1. Install the Share Carts browser extension and visit a supported store.
 2. Click the 'Share Cart' button, located on the bottom right corner of any page.
 3. Share Carts will automatically create and display a shareable cart link.

--------

It is free to use Share Carts, and no registration is required to use our extension.

Share Carts may earn an affiliate commission from any purchases facilitated through the use of this extension.
